login.title: Login
login.subtitle: Decentralized Intellectual Property Collaboration Platform
login.feature2: ✅ Write stories with friends, hosted by the Foundation shared copyright
login.feature3: ✅ Earn copyright benefits proportionally based on reader votes and article references
login.feature4: ✅ Records are completely transparent, fully traceable
login.feature5: ✅ Build the largest collaborative IP creation community in the world

hint.tokenLocalOnly: It is strongly recommended to register a new GitHub user and get a personal access token.

login.registerHelpContent:
Step 1: Visit GitHub

Open your browser and go to https://github.com


Step 2: Click Sign Up

Click the Sign up button in the top right corner of GitHub homepage


Step 3: Fill Registration Info

• Enter username
• Enter email address
• Set password
• Verify you're not a robot


Step 4: Verify Email

Check your email and click the verification link sent by GitHub


Step 5: Get Token

Go directly to: https://github.com/settings/tokens


Generate Steps

• Click Generate new token → Generate new token (classic)
• Fill Note: DIPCP Application
• Select Expiration: Recommend 'Never' (no expiration)
• Important: Check ALL permission options (select all)
• Click Generate token


Copy Token

• Copy and save the token immediately (only shown once)
• Paste the token into the Token field on login page


Note: Token is only shown once, please save it carefully!

validation.invalidTokenFormat: Token format error: Token cannot contain non-ASCII characters (such as Chinese characters). Please ensure the Token only contains letters, numbers, and standard symbols.

reviewers.description: Reviewers team - Responsible for reviewing contributions and granting points through comments

maintainers.description: Maintainers team - Responsible for merging PRs and managing contributions, but restricted by CODEOWNERS

auth.title: GitHub Authentication
auth.message: Please enter your GitHub Personal Access Token for authentication:
auth.instructions:
How to get it:
1. Visit https://github.com/settings/tokens
2. Click "Generate new token (classic)"
3. Select "public_repo" permission
4. Copy the generated token

cla.title: Collaborator License Agreement
cla.content: As a collaborator to the DIPCP platform, you need to sign a Collaborator License Agreement to transfer intellectual property ownership completely to the DIPCNPO (Decentralized IP Collaboration Non-Profit Organization). The organization will uniformly manage and be responsible for the maintenance and operation of intellectual property. Please read through before signing the agreement.
cla.realNamePlaceholder: Your real name as a signature
cla.rejected: User refused to sign CLA agreement
cla.signingStatement: I confirm that I have read and agree to all terms of the above Collaborator License Agreement.
cla.autoGenerated: This file is automatically generated by DIPCP system
